# OneAD

## Example

```html
<amp-ad
  width="300"
  height="250"
  type="onead"
  layout="responsive"
  data-playmode="amp-inread"
  data-uid="1000126"
  data-pid="1121156"
  data-host="demo"
>
</amp-ad>
```

## Configuration

Supported parameters:

-   `data-playmode`
-   `data-uid`
-   `data-pid` (optional)
-   `data-host` (optional)

For configuration details, please contact [OneAD](https://www.onead.com.tw/)
